inventorysorter.config.screen.title: Inventory Sorter Settings
The url to a remote config file, which will be downloaded and used for compatibility
inventorysorter.config.compat.hideButton: Turning this off will disable the sort button in %s
inventorysorter.config.sortButton.toolti: Turning this off will disable the sort button in all inventories
inventorysorter.config.doubleClickSort.t: Double-Click an empty slot to sort
inventorysorter.config.scrollbehaviour.f: Scrolling over the sort button will change the sorting method
inventorysorter.config.scrollbehaviour.m: Scrolling over the sort button will change the sorting method while holding %s
inventorysorter.config.scrollbehaviour.d: Scrolling over the sort button will not change the sorting method
inventorysorter.config.separateButton.to: Display a separate sort button in the player's inventory
inventorysorter.config.sortPlayerInvento: Helpful when you want to sort the player inventory separately from the container
inventorysorter.config.showTooltip.toolt: The tooltip shows the sort type when hovering over the sort button
inventorysorter.config.sortHovered: Only Sort the Inventory Under the Mouse
inventorysorter.config.sortHovered.toolt: Only sort the inventory under the mouse when using the keybind or double-click sort
inventorysorter.cmd.sortHovered.set: Only sort the inventory under the mouse is now %s
inventorysorter.cmd.sortHovered.get: Only sort the inventory under the mouse is currently %s
inventorysorter.cmd.player-required: This command can only be run by a player
inventorysorter.cmd.nosort.add.fail: This container cannot be added to the not sortable list
inventorysorter.cmd.nosort.remove.fail: Failed to remove container from the not sortable list
inventorysorter.cmd.nosort.list: Sorting is prevented for the following containers: %s
inventorysorter.cmd.hideButton.add.fail: This container cannot be added to the hide button list
inventorysorter.cmd.hideButton.remove.su: Sort Button is now visible for the container
inventorysorter.cmd.hideButton.remove.fa: Failed to remove container from the hide button list
inventorysorter.cmd.remote.set.success: Remote configuration is now set to: %s
inventorysorter.cmd.remote.clear.success: Remote configuration URL has been cleared
inventorysorter.cmd.screenid.fail: Targeted container doesn't have a compatible screen
inventorysorter.cmd.sort.error: Sorting failed, please check the logs or report a bug
inventorysorter.sorttype.name: Name
Scroll while holding %s to change sorting method
Click while holding %s to hide button
